content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0) with iron plate production capability.

### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0) with copper plate production capability.

### Iron ore and copper ore harvesting
No specific structure is identified for iron ore and copper ore harvesting, but the agent has been harvesting these resources.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it.
- Make sure the furnace fuel source is not full before adding more fuel.
- Ensure the furnace source is not full before adding more ingredients.

### Errors when extracting items from furnace
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when adding items to furnace
- Ensure you can add items to the furnace before attempting to do so.
- Make sure the furnace is not already full of ingredients or fuel before adding more. 

Note: There are no error messages in the provided logs, so the error tips are based on general furnace usage and potential issues that may arise.
